players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Oh no, Alice is dead! This is terrible. We need to figure out who the mafia is."
You: "Diana, your reaction seems very quick and dramatic. Why are you immediately trying to direct the conversation?"
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. We should vote her out immediately."
Diana: "Charlie, that's a desperate lie! If you were the detective, why didn't you say anything before Bob questioned me? You're trying to frame me because I was suspicious of you."

You: "Charlie, if you're really the detective, your timing is suspicious. You only claimed to investigate Diana after I questioned her reaction. Real detectives usually share findings earlier or more strategically."
Charlie: "I am the detective. I investigated Diana N1 and she is mafia. My timing was to confirm suspicions before accusing."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
